          <title>
            <string language="en">Ways of finding the pH of solutions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Methoden des Findens des pH der Lösungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voies de trouver le pH des solutions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maneiras de encontrar o pH das soluções</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modi di individuazione del pH delle soluzioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρόποι το pH των λύσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Maneras de encontrar el pH de soluciones</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows two methods of identifying the pH value of different solutions by the use of a universal indicator (left) and a pH meter (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkalinity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">basicity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ph meter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">universal indicator</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt zwei Methoden des 
Kennzeichnens des pH-Wertes der unterschiedlichen Lösungen durch den 
Gebrauch von einer Universalanzeige (nach links) und einem pH-Messer 
(recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre deux méthodes 
d'identifier la valeur du pH de différentes solutions par 
l'utilisation d'un indicateur universel (à gauche) et d'un pH-mètre 
(droit).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra dois métodos de 
identificar o valor de pH de soluções diferentes pelo uso de um 
indicador universal (à esquerda) e de um medidor de pH (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra due metodi di 
identificare il grado di pH delle soluzioni differenti tramite l'uso 
di un indicatore universale (a sinistra) e di un pH-metro (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δύο μεθόδους την αξία 
pH των διαφορετικών λύσεων με την χρήση ενός καθολικού δείκτη
(αριστερά) και ενός μετρητή pH (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra dos métodos de 
identificar el valor de pH de diversas soluciones por el uso de un 
indicador universal (a la izquierda) y de un contador de pH (derecho).</string>
          </description>
